title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 46 - School Bus Equipment
content:

§ 46.1 - Signs
§ 46.2 - Lights
§ 46.3 - Use
§ 46.4 - Approval
§ 46.5 - Application to other classes of children
§ 46.6 - Use of two-way radios
§ 46.7 - Use of school bus stop arm
§ 46.8 - Use of back-up beepers
§ 46.9 - Use of front crossing arms
§ 46.10 - Use of safety sensor devices

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 46

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 214, 215[a], 220, 375, 3775

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
